name: Quick Maths
description: Quick Maths is a script that explores themes of rapid calculation, mental agility, and mathematical speed. Characters have abilities related to quick thinking, fast computation, and rapid problem-solving.
author: Jams, Josh, Kerry, & Zak
specialRules: Focus on rapid calculation and quick thinking
Explores concepts of mental agility and fast computation
setupNotes: This script emphasizes speed and mental agility. Players should be prepared for abilities involving rapid calculation and quick decision-making.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: Use standard night order. Expect heavy info webs and poison/drunk interactions. Announce pacing up front and keep days brisk. Nudge players to state numbers/results clearly so the table can compute deltas over time. Track ongoing modifiers (poison, madness, red herrings) meticulously.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Cross-reference counts nightly; compare today’s changes to yesterday’s to spot consistent liars or poison paths. Test for Vortox early by seeking contradictions. Save confirmers (Seamstress/Juggler) for pivotal days. Evil: Introduce small, plausible arithmetic errors; keep lies consistent. Poison high-impact nodes (hubs of info) over loud talkers. Time Demon swaps/changes around public checkpoints to scramble baselines.
bluffing: Claim roles that generate compact results (single numbers or yes/no) to sound precise. Offer spreadsheets or structured logs to appear credible. If caught in contradictions, attribute to Vortox/poison or a mis-copied note and realign your story; consistency over perfection wins trust.

modifiers.note: Baron adds 2 Outsiders and removes 2 Townsfolk.
Godfather adds 1 Outsider and removes 1 Townsfolk.
